page.title: 01D block Introduction
page.content: Welcome to the text pages produced by the following schools:{Greasby Junior, {Greasby Infant, St.Josephs R.C Primary {Woodchurch C.E and Christchurch C.E Primary schools. During the{summer(it rained most of {the time)of}1985 each school went out into the environment gathering and sorting information.Parents helped with supervision and transport.In school we ploughed through telephone directories,Yellow Pages,and Thompson Local Directories,looking for doctors' surgeries,garden centres etc...Probably the most enjoyable part was talking to people particularly the elderly,who always seemed to have a tale to tell.Of the information gathered only afraction can be shown.We{hope you of the future enjoy {reading it as much as we of the 1980s {enjoyed putting it together.
